DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to identify the most optimal therapy for Bowen's disease: excision versus Photodynamic therapy.
DOC.brief_title: Trial of Excision Versus Photodynamic Therapy in the Treatment of Bowen's Disease
DOC.detailed_description: The study is a randomized clinical trial in which two treatment options for Bowen's disease, excision and photodynamic therapy, are compared on recurrence rate, cosmesis en expenses.
DOC.criteria: Age > 18 years Histological proven Bowen's disease on scalp, face, trunk, arms and legs Informed Consent Recurrent Bowen's disease Anogenital or subungual Bowe's disease Other skin malignancy in the same area Porphyria
